summary: Request for worker versioning support in the Ruby SDK. This issue was closed as it applied to a previous version of the SDK that is no longer applicable following the SDK's rewrite and refresh.
userImpact: Users cannot manage multiple versions of workflow and activity code concurrently in the Ruby SDK worker.
resolutionDetails: The issue applied to a previous version of the SDK that is no longer applicable following the SDK's rewrite and refresh
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
